pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tau Measure with Right-Censored Data // A clinically meaningful measure of treatment effect based on Kendall's tau with right- censored data along with corresponding inference procedure. The plot of tau process is provided as a graphical tool for monitoring the progression. It complements another summary measures under nonproportional hazards. For details, please refer to Tai, Wang and Wells (2023) doi:10.1002/pst.2324.
